attributes.action: Have a minister from government, preferably front bench, present when our fallen heroes are returned from war
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am asking for a minister from government, preferably a high profile minister to be be present at any location throughout the United Kingdom where our fallen heroes are returned from the warzones we occupy to their native land. They should form part of the guard of honour to receive them. After all you sent them there now show them some dignity!
